page.title: 18UPWOOD MANOR (PART 3)
page.content:
Mr.and Mrs.Rowley used to live in London. They moved to Upwood a few years ago to live in the country. Before they moved there, 56 High St. was an old coach house. There were ruts left from where the coach went in. When they moved there there was a petrol pump by the wall. They were told by experts to move it because it could have been dangerous. Also there was a well in the back garden which they dug out a little while ago. One of their sheds they now use for junk. When they came it was a stable. There are also traces of bricks under the garden.
by Kate and Joanne
